entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Halifax (Shearwater)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:37 PM AST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -2.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Shearwater Airport 03:00 AM AST Tuesday 14 February 2023
Temperature: -2.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.6 kPa rising
Humidity: 98 %
Wind Chill: -9
Dewpoint: -2.7°C
Wind: NNW 27 km/h gust 37 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy ending overnight then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow over exposed areas late this evening and overnight. Amount 15 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 along parts of the coast this evening. Wind becoming north 30 gusting to 50 near midnight. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries. High zero.
entry.summary: Flurries ending in the afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Blowing snow over exposed areas early in the morning. Amount 2 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 along parts of the coast early in the morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 in the morning. High zero. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Clear. Low minus 7 except minus 11 in low lying areas.
entry.summary: Clearing late in the evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 7 except minus 11 in low lying areas. Wind chill minus 14 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. High plus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 13 February 2023
